name: Amiel Malay
text: Revolving doors act as airlocks, preventing sudden gusts of warm (or cold) air from coming in (or going out). Though revolving doors can operate without power, air curtains are used more frequently, since it can accommodate people AND bigger stuff (e.g. shopping carts, baby strollers, cargo carts/hand trolleys).

source_obj.text: Revolving doors act as airlocks, preventing sudden gusts of warm (or cold) air from coming in (or going out). Though revolving doors can operate without power, air curtains are used more frequently, since it can accommodate people AND bigger stuff (e.g. shopping carts, baby strollers, cargo carts/hand trolleys).
